channel.title: Jesse Duplantis Ministries Board Room Chat Video Podcast
channel.description: The Boardroom Chats with Jesse and Cathy Duplantis are anointed messages filled with biblical wisdom, inspirational teachings, and supernatural joy! Each chat will encourage you to walk in FAITH as you study God’s Word. Get ready to experience the presence of our Heavenly Father on a whole new level!

item.title: Use This Verse… And Mistakes Will Not Be A Part Of Your Life!
item.dc:creator: Jesse & Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Enjoy this clip from a classic Boardroom Chat with Jesse and Cathy and be encouraged to always live by the spirit of TRUTH! You can watch this message in its entirety here (https://jesseduplantisministries.subspla.sh/wpcs578).

  

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:

item.title: Tradition…TRADITION!
item.dc:creator: Jesse & Cathy Duplantis

And join us for this year’s VISIONARY conference on July 10th and 11th! Registration is FREE and everyone is welcome! (https://jdm.org/product/365/visionary-conference-2025)

item.title: It's Time To Kill The Curve With Faith
item.dc:creator: Jesse & Cathy Duplantis
item.description:
Jesse and Cathy encourage all to pray for our leaders, nation, and world during the Covid-19 pandemic. Let’s bind the Coronavirus and speak HOPE in this time of uncertainty.

Follow JDM on these social media platforms:
